greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = numerator of the X-coordinate of n*P where P is the generator for rational points on the curve y^2 + y = x^3 - x.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..212
B. Mazur, Arithmetic on curves, Bull. Amer. Math. Soc. 14 (1986), 207-259; see p. 225.
formula: a(-n) = a(n) = - A006769(n-1) * A006769(n+1) for all n in Z. - _Michael Somos_, Jul 28 2016
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
